title: Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server issue since patch 5.2
body:
Hi guys,

Ever since patch 5.2, whenever I try logging on, the login screen will be stuck at logging in and then display the message "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server issue". I need to restart the client and try it 3 or 4 times before it actually logs me in. Sometimes, I have to retry five or six times. Does anyone know the problem and how to resolve it?

Thanks.

replies.body: Riot, can you PLEASE address this issue?  Countless people have to attempt to login 10-50 times without any solution.  Yes, I have tried your solutions offered and none work.  Please, address this issue.
For the love of god, please ADDRESS this Riot!
every single time

I like the way the LOGIN SERVERS have been down for over half an hour in NORTH AMERICA and the status is showing NORMAL.  Maybe you should spend some money on a NETWORK OPERATIONS CENTER.  Maybe you could run a script to login to the NORTH AMERICA (or maybe even each site, like a real company) and when you can't authenticate in, like us thousands, you might change the status to "possible login issues."

Just a suggestion for a successful IT business in the 90's.......

Riot, seriously you have the biggest game in the world and you cant even solve simple login issues. I deal with crap that should be easy fixes day in and day out. First it started with being unable to access the store "most the time". Then it became okay you cannot access the store. I have come to terms with that. Then the chat service is randomly disconnecting multiple times throughout the day, okay I don't really need to chat with friends I will deal with it. I am now having to try to log in multiple times to get into the game, okay not a problem just a minor set back. NOW I can't even access the game at all I counted over 50 login attempts with the same outcome(cannot connect to pvp.net servers.) Don't worry I did what I am supposed to do I checked the server status don't worry the servers are up. So now I have decided to check the handy dandy COMMON LOGIN ISSUES PAGE I went down the list and who would have guessed I would find myself still stuck in the same position as before. I have thrown away countless dollars to this game. Countless hours of wasted time and you know what. I am not angry or going to rage. I calmly ask you please do something help me access my fav pastime please just help me.

Uninstall & re-install and reattempt logging in.
If that doesn't work, buy a new computer and change your ISP.

Change religion and believe in Riot. Buy more RP.
Still can't log in? Are you still using the old peripherals you were before? Buy new ones.

Still can't play? Move to another continent and go through steps 1 to 5 again for good measure.
Buy RP.

1-Go to Internet Explorer
2-Hit Tools

4-Scroll down until you find Security
5-Turn off SSL 2.0 and SSL 3.0 and turn on TLS 1.0 
6-Hit apply(then OK)
7-Open League Of Legends
